ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T19:49:28 [Issue ID 4000-157576] urn:comicvine:4000-157576 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 15:02:25. [Issue ID 640191]
ComicInfo.Summary: Sara returns from a mysterious all-nighter to find Patrick and Dani in her apartment fretting about her. Sara demands that Danielle give her the other half of the Witchblade back and immediately attacks her. With a dark and violent Sara on the verge of victory, she is stabbed through the back by the angelic Sabine and killed.

ComicInfo.Title: War of the Witchblades Part 3; Credits and Recap
